info.name: Discord Flat Dark & Clean
info.description:
Flat Dark & Clean skin for Discord. Can be used in the desktop app with the help of Better Discord. Just paste the CSS code into the Custom CSS. Do not include the first and last line of the code.
Having the Dark theme selected in options is recommended.
